attributes.action: Reduce Sergeant Alexander Blackmans sentence to 'time served'
attributes.background: Sergeant Alexander Blackman was accused of murder for the death of a Taliban fighter. Our Sergeant has now had his prosecution reduced to manslaughter on the grounds of diminished responsibility, and should have his sentence reduced to 'time served' be freed, and given an honourable discharge.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/172778
